paragraph:
The next Wonder Woman movie will apparently be used to perform a reboot of the DC movie universe. There will be new actors cast for Batman and Superman.Ben Affleck is in rehab for his alcoholism. Ben has been Batman in two movies.Henry Cavill has been Superman. Henry was fighting Warner Brothers over his salary.
